text: Morgan Davis is an award-winning Canadian blues singer, guitarist, and songwriter. He was born and spent his childhood in Detroit, Michigan, before relocating to Toronto, Ontario, Canada, in 1968.Morgan Davis biography; www.morgandavis.com. Retrieved 2015-07-03. He moved to Halifax, Nova Scotia, in 2001.Chris Martin, What's in the air at Bearlys that keeps Morgan Davis coming back. CBC Music, May 9, 2012. Retrieved 2015-07-03. His song "Why'd You Lie" was a hit for Colin James and featured on James' 1988 debut album. "Reefer Smokin' Man" was described as a "blues cult classic". Davis' principal major label release, Morgan Davis, on Stony Plain Records, was produced by Colin Linden.Colin Linden Timeline/Fact Sheet ; www.colinlinden.com. Retrieved 2015-07-03. Davis is described as a "Canadian blues hero". Davis was the recipient of multiple awards, including a Juno Award, for his 2003 release, Painkiller, on Electro-Fi Records."CARAS Scores A Hit With 2004 Juno Awards".
